name: Hydrangea
description:
Hydrangea - A rainy season story

You're a cute cloud during the Japanese rainy season that happens in June and July .

A thunderstorm is coming and you have to save the snails from the bad clouds that throw thunderbolts! Rain on them to make them go quicker, and get their eternal gratitude!

How many hearts will you get?

A controller is needed.

Made with a minimum of animations in a few hours with Pixel Game Maker MV
